content.query:
-- CREATING EXTERNAL DATASOURCE

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE raw_container
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'abfss://raw@saprojectmaestrosnd.dfs.core.windows.net/'
);

-- USING EXTERNAL DATASOURCE
SELECT *
FROM 
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'Unemployment.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'raw_container', 
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) AS DATA
